messages.start:
`Hi {},` Welcome to Developers Job Hub Bot! 🤖

I provide personalised developer job listings based on your programming stack straight to your DM with ease after scraping and exploring the web 😊🚀

All jobs are gotten from
• [We Work Remotely](weworkremotely.com)
• [RemoteOK](remoteok.io)
• [Employ Remotely](employremotely.com)
• [Remotive](remotive.io)
• [Stack Overflow](stackoverflow.com)
• [RemoteCo](remoteco.com)
• [Python Org](python.org)
• [Hackerrank](hackerrank.com)

Made with ❤️ in 🇳🇬
